Package ooga.model.initialization.pieces

Class PieceComponentClassLoader

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.initialization.pieces.PieceComponentClassLoader
public class PieceComponentClassLoader
extends java.lang.Object
Used to load the different components that compose a piece

  • Method Details

    • makePieceMove

      public PieceMovement makePieceMove​(java.lang.String moveType, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parameters, int direction, GamePiece correspondingPiece)
      Makes a piece movement object that corresponds to the given piece movement type
      Parameters:
      moveType - The name of the type of piece movement
      parameters - The parameter map that will determine the properties of the piece movement
      direction - The direction of the piece movement, changes for user/opponent
      correspondingPiece - The game piece that this move corresponds to
      Returns:
      The PieceMovement object

    • makeRestriction

      public Restriction makeRestriction​(java.lang.String restrictionName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parameters, GamePiece piece)
      Makes a restriction object that corresponds to the given restriction type
      Parameters:
      restrictionName - The name of the restriction
      parameters - The parameters of the restriction
      piece - The piece that the movement object corresponds to for these restrictions
      Returns:
      The restriction object

    • makeCondition

      Makes a condition object that corresponds to the given condition type
      Parameters:
      conditionName - The name of the condition
      parameters - The parameters of the condition
      piece - The piece that the condition corresponds to
      Returns:
      The condition object
